motivations: I'm not only skincare user but I also Beauty Consultant of Mary Kay. As a students, it normal for us if you have acne problem. I also live in that circle but you have to know "Don't be so Obsessed but Trust the process". When you use skincare, please follow the routine. For example, maximum we can wash our face is two time in a day. If more that, it can make your skin dry up. First pandemic 3 month, i struggle for my first war with acne. Seriously, i so shy to go out from my room because of that but now Puji Tuhan, finally my ance better than first pandemic. If you interested with Mary Kay, WhatsApp me 0197008571.✌️
